ygData.subject: Re: Twisting and connections
ygData.msgSnippet: I can usually twist three songs successfully if I don t get Bashed/Stunned. I haven t tried four yet. It may help that I m running ISDN and am connected at
ygData.messageBody:
I can usually twist three songs successfully if I don't get Bashed/Stunned.
I haven't tried four yet. It may help that I'm running ISDN and am connected
at either 64K Digital or 128K Digital. I usually don't experience packet
loss...ever (Except when the game first went live, I almost quit before I
got started...)

Lulen
Bard of the 13th Chrous
Solusek Ro

----- Original Message -----
From: <chlebek@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 11:01
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Twisting and connections


> From: chlebek@...
>
>
>
>
> > What ISP's are you all using?
>
> AT&T Worldnet. USR Sportster 56K modem. Usually connect at 50K.
>
> What kind of packet loss do you usually get? I've found that with even a
few
> percent my ability to twist more than 2 songs drops dramatically.
>
> Taelin
